Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "Generic:weapons:dagger"
"Generic:weapons:stiletto"
"Generic:weapons:sword-practice"
"Generic:weapons:longsword"
"Generic:clothing:scabbard"
"Generic:clothing:scabbard-short"
"Generic:weapons:mask-dueling"
"Generic:literature:book-weaponsmithing"
"PERSONAL ARMAMENTS: A Winter Catalog For Weaponsmiths"

"CONTENTS\
\
2. Dagger\
3. Stiletto\
4. Practice Sword\
5. Longsword\
6. Scabbard\
7. Short Scabbard\
8. Dueling Mask\
9. Weaponsmithing Book\
10. Updates\
\
All items offered in this catalog (except the Scabbard) are manufactured in accordance with Guild of Weaponsmiths guidelines, and will accept all standard customization options of Metal, Design, Stone and Engraving.\
\
NOTE: Scabbard alterations include Material, Fit, Color and Symbol, and require the skills of Tailoring, Dyeing and/or Embroidering."
"A plain Dagger of highly malleable construction. One size fits all."
"A plain Stiletto, primed for all standard options. One size fits all."
"A plain Practice Sword, eager to accept alterations. One size fits all."
"A plain Longsword, waiting for an artist who can transform it into a masterpiece. One size fits all."
"A plain belt-style Scabbard, accomodating all standard Practice Swords and Longswords. One size fits all."
"A plain belt-style Short Scabbard, accomodating all standard Daggers and Stilettos. One size fits all."
"A plain Dueling Mask, fully customizable for metal, design and engraving. One size fits all."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF ARMSMAKING: A Reference For Weaponsmiths. Indispensable reading for students of the craft!"

"UPDATES\
\
New items of personal armament are always being commissioned by the Master Weaponsmiths of Castle Marrach. The text of this catalog will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of any StoryHost."
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Weaponsmiths.]"
"[An advertisement for the Royal Winter Weapon Shoppe.]"
